description: These are forest roads that go deep into the forest. There are also interconnecting "cart tracks" and grass roads and singletrack throughout the system that are not included on this map.The roads are open to vehicles in the fall but are very rough. The roads could probably be ridden on a hybrid but I would not do it. They are better suited to an MTB.Most of these roads are used as snowmobile trails in the winterThe distance calculation does not include overlaps and the time is an approximation.
directions: Trail Head is on Roger Stevens Drive, east of Dwyer Hill Road.
title: Marlborough Forest South forest roads
